extendedInfo.description: Health Tracker & Manager by ConstantMDâ¢It is a web-based software & service created by ConstantMD.com. It is a personal health and medical care account connected to robust software that manages the health and medical care of individuals and families. Our dream is to create a personal health and medical care account like this for every individual of this world. That will solve many problems related to health and medical care. Health Tracker & Manager by ConstantMD App is free for anyone. â¢ Health Tracker & Manager by ConstantMD allows you to securely communicate day-to-day health data such as blood pressure, blood sugar, compliance with medication, etc. to physicians and family members. Individuals can monitor and track all aspects of health and medical care, including medical problems, medications, medication intake history, refills, allergies, blood pressure, blood sugar, weight, immunization, follow-up schedules, uploaded medical records, food intake, physical activities, instructions, access to medical records, and others.â¢ Health Tracker & Manager by ConstantMD helps users to analyze and store day-to-day health information.Users:â¢Individual patients and familiesâ¢Health insurance companiesâ¢Government agenciesâ¢EmployersFeatures and benefits:â¢Helps to manage chronic diseases such as diabetes, hypertension, congestive heart failure, etc.â¢Decreases health care cost.â¢Improves the quality of health care.â¢Individuals can monitor and track all aspects of health and medical care, including medical problems, medications, medication intake history, refills, allergies, blood pressure, blood sugar, weight, immunization, follow-up schedules, uploaded medical records, food intake, physical activities, instructions, access to medical records, and others.â¢Stores medical records in a secure, web-based, HIPAA-compliant server which can be accessed from anywhere by the patient.â¢Users can give secure access to physicians and family members from anywhere.â¢Allows users to manage the health and medical care of their parents or grandparents from remote location.â¢Very easy to use.â¢Access available from any computer and mobile device with internet connection.â¢HIPAA-compliant and very secure. Please see the security features.â¢Some features are available only from desktop, laptop and tablet PC. Some other features are only available in paid subscription.Visit ConstantMD.com to signup for a free patient account and start using this free app.

reviews.title: One of the best app for health care tracking.
reviews.comment: Great design and functionality.nice ... very user friendly.
reviews.author: Ahasan Habib

reviews.title: Great Free App!
reviews.comment: I like this app very much. Its free - it has everything I need. It has lots of module to use and manage my data. I can also disable modules that I don\'t need. Module includes Medication, Allergies, Medical Problems, Vitals, Blood Pressure, Blood Sugar, Pulse, Lab results (I can add any test I want), Radiology, Insurance,  Doctor Appointments and so on.   This is a highly configurable app. I would like to request the developer to develop some features for reporting. Other than its a perfect app to manage your health and medical records.   Very user friendly. Data is stored on their server, so I don\'t have to worry about my phone being lost or damaged. I can log in from any smart phone or tablet or laptops.
reviews.author: Manir Zaman

reviews.title: not user friendly
reviews.comment: Lots of information but is not to user friendly and ask all the wrong information about medication and does not allow one to make updates easily. I am now installing after 25 minutes of screwing around with it.
reviews.author: Joshua Brenner

reviews.title: Great medical app
reviews.comment: It is a great medical app and user friendly. I am using it for my mother.Easy to manage her blood pressure and blood sugar. Her physician finds it  very helpful too .
reviews.author: Shumeen Saleheen

reviews.comment: Not quite what I\'m looking for.
reviews.author: Patrizia Elisabeth Schwartz
